metadata.name: Progressive Tonality 1
metadata.description:
Progressive Tonality

Digital artworks inspired by the music of Gustav Mahler.  
Mixed art graphics, series celebrating the artist and his notes and tones. 

The Netherlands - 2018- 6000 x 6000 px  
Artist MRK
